rule: The category label must not match exactly one of the terms: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech, and must include variations in spelling, capitalization, or punctuation.
validityText:
The input "Breakthrough tech achievements in space" appears to be very brief and lacks enough context to clearly classify it into one of the specified categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). While "tech" and "space" suggest it might belong to Sci/Tech, the statement as it stands does not provide adequate contextual information to confirm this.
